name: Purgatory 2
description:
Fall once more into the depths of purgatory...

One year after the events of ―Purgatory―, there are numerous reports of hellbeast sightings at the Royal Capital. No one knows who is behind the cause of these threats, but sometimes one must go deep into the depths to find the answer. Since this game is a sequel to ―Purgatory―, it is highly recommended to play the first game to understand the story and contents better before playing.

This game is made by Nama using Wolf RPG Editor and it was released on October 26th, 2018. The American fan translation group, Memories of Fear, translated this game and released it on February 14th, 2021.

There is an extreme boss rush mode version of the game made available titled ―Purgatory 2― Demonic Mode.
